com.wafflesoft.kinectcontroller.config.factories

Interface GestureFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MouseGestureFactory

    public interface GestureFactory
    Created by jake on 12/24/2015. The config.jj file -- javacc uses it to generate config parsing Java classes -- will use this interface in order to write a system for working with creating premade gestures for the users.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void installGesture(ControllerState state)
      This creates a Gesture (or any number of gestures) with the loaded config map and then installs it into the given ControllerState.
      boolean loadConfig(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> config)
      Loads the configuration options for the premade gesture.

    • Method Detail

      • loadConfig

        boolean loadConfig(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> config)
        Loads the configuration options for the premade gesture.
        Parameters:
        config - This map consists of whatever properties the user decided to enter into their config file. Each factory is responsible for their own data validation.
        Returns:
        True if the configuration options were valid, false otherwise.

      • installGesture

        void installGesture(ControllerState state)
        This creates a Gesture (or any number of gestures) with the loaded config map and then installs it into the given ControllerState.
        Parameters:
        state - This is the _state that the premade gesture will be installed into.
